sentence.Network_en: Language Skills: Ability to write and speak English proficiently.

sentence.Network_en: Although not a diplomat, he can proficiently use diplomatic terms.
sentence.Network_cn: 他虽然不是外交官, 却能熟练地使用外交辞令.

sentence.Network_en: Green Belt certified & proficiently uses the Six Sigma tools for problem solving.
